meanings.definition: A diagnostic procedure used to visualize the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended a lymphangiogram to see the lymphatic vessels clearly.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully conducted the lymphangiogram to examine the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent3: During the lymphangiogram, the patient joked about glowing lymphatic vessels on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The lymphangiogram revealed a map of hidden rivers flowing through the body.
meanings.sent5: In the dim room, the lymphangiogram lit up the path of the lymphatic vessels like a treasure map.

meanings.definition: The resulting images produced by a lymphangiogram.
meanings.sent1: The lymphangiograms displayed detailed pictures of the lymphatic system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors analyzed the lymphangiograms to understand the lymphatic vessels better.
meanings.sent3: The patient marveled at the abstract art-like quality of the lymphangiograms.
meanings.sent4: The lymphangiograms resembled intricate spider webs spread across the screen.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors in the lymphangiograms made the lymphatic vessels look like neon lights.
